body:
Hello Avicus Network
I have recently started a series on my channel "Avicus Map Overview" and basically I would like to ask the following questions

- Hows the quality of the overviews?
- What can I improve on?
- What recommended maps do you think I should do?

If you have never seen the Avicus Map Overview series you can watch it here!
body_tagged:

title: Avicus Map Overview Feedback

replies.body: it's a bit long, I get bored after 2 mins :/
replies.body_tagged: it's a bit long, I get bored after 2 mins :/

replies.body:
Agreeing with Frozen ^ The videos can be a little boring due to their length (A good example is the Palm Rust review. The video took 5 minutes to review even though it's a pretty small map with very limited features).

I'd recommend cutting down the amount of times you fly over certain areas so people don't keep thinking "Ah, yes, blue team's base again. Boring." In addition to this, try switching perspectives more often instead of continious flying around and add in some more close ups of things like the monuments.

Hope this helped! ^_^
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Like Petlas said, change it up from close ups of monuments, areas or even gameplay of that map. This would make the videos more interesting.
replies.body_tagged: Like Petlas said, change it up from close ups of monuments, areas or even gameplay of that map. This would make the videos more interesting.
